dcterms:creator: X. Liu
A. Eshghi
P. Swietojanski
V. Rieser
dcterms:description: The NLU-Benchmark dataset is annotated with scenarios, actions, and entities, covering multiple home assistant tasks such as playing music or calendar queries, chit-chat, and commands issued to a robot. It contains 25,716 utterances and is split into 10 folds.
dcterms:title: NLU-Benchmark

dcterms:creator: C. T. Hemphill
J. J. Godfrey
G. R. Doddington
dcterms:description: ATIS is a well-studied dataset comprising annotated transcripts of audio recordings of people making flight reservations. It contains 4,478 training, 500 development, and 893 test utterances.
dcterms:title: ATIS

dcterms:creator: A. Coucke
A. Saade
A. Ball
T. Bluche
A. Caulier
D. Leroy
C. Gisselbrecht
F. Caltagirone
T. Lavril
M. Primet
J. Dureau
dcterms:description: The SNIPS dataset is collected from the Snips personal voice assistant and contains 13,784 training and 700 test examples, focusing on intent classification and entity recognition.
dcterms:title: SNIPS
